name: Fox (hwanchoi510)
description:
2D Platformer Game made for practices
It is a imitation of an old game "Ponpoko"

The game is designed to have 2 stages
The player has to collect all the items within time while dodging all the enemies

It is my first game so feel free to comment anything I could do to make it better.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

너구리를 모방한 2D 플랫포머 게임입니다

2 스테이지로 나뉘어져 있고,  플레이어는 시간 내에 적들을 피하며 아이템을 모두 주우면 됩니다. 

제 첫 게임이라 보완할 점이 있으면 알려주세요.
